![Solar And Art Fest 019](https://presidiotx.us/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/Solar-And-Art-Fest-019-300x239.jpg)
![](https://presidiotx.us/wp-content/uploads/2026/01/Notice-of-Deadline-to-file-application-for-place-on-the-ballot-cities-2026-pdf.jpg)
[Sec. 22.032. QUALIFICATIONS OF MEMBERS OF GOVERNING BODY.](https://statutes.capitol.texas.gov/Docs/LG/htm/LG.22.htm#22.032)

(a) To be eligible for the office of mayor of the municipality, a person must be a registered voter and must have resided within the municipal limits for at least the 12 months preceding the election day. For purposes of this subsection, residency in an area while the area was not within the municipal limits is considered as residency within the limits if the area is a part of the municipality on election day.

(b) To be eligible for the office of council member of the municipality, a person must be a registered voter and must reside on election day in the ward from which the person may be elected.

City of Presidio Candidate Packet – General Election May 2, 2026

![](https://presidiotx.us/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/Presidio-CDV23-0300-PH-Notice-Amendment-pdf.jpg)

**Beginning October 1, 2025, the City of Presidio will now require any
paying with their debit or credit card to pay the 10% credit card processing fee of their total utility bill.**
======================================================================================================================================================================================

**A partir del 1 de octubre de 2025, la ciudad de Presidio ahora requiere que cualquier cliente que pague con su trajeta de debito o credito pague la tarifa de procesamiento del 10% de su factura total de servicios publicos.**
==================================================================================================================================================================================================================================

City of Presidio Approved and Adopted Budget & Tax Rate Levy
------------------------------------------------------------

for Fiscal Year 2025-2026
-------------------------

As part of the “Make Presidio Beautiful” campaign, the City of Presidio is offering assistance to citizens who need to get rid of old household appliances. Please call City Hall at 432-229-3517 or come by to add your name to the list. Let’s join together to beautify our community!
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Como parte de la campaña “Embellece Presidio”, la Ciudad de Presidio ofrece asistencia a los ciudadanos que necesitan deshacerse de sus electrodomésticos viejos. Llame al Ayuntamiento al 432-229-3517 o visítenos para agregar su nombre a la lista. ¡Unámonos para embellecer nuestra comunidad!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

![](https://presidiotx.us/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/Old-appliances.jpg)
![](https://presidiotx.us/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/updated-notice-for-website-pdf.jpg)
![](https://presidiotx.us/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/TCEQ-lead-requirements-notice-6-30-2025-pdf.jpg)
![](https://presidiotx.us/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Newspaper-Ad-for-Letters-of-Interest-to-Civic-Services-6-2025-pdf.jpg)

### City of Presidio Planning and Zoning & Library Board Members needed, please fill out a [Civic Service Application](https://presidiotx.us/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/Civic-Ser-Application.pdf) and turn in to the City of Presidio City Secretary at City Hall, 507 W. O’Reilly St. City of Presidio, TX. or email to bornelas@presidiotx.us

### **The City of Presidio is calling out for Letters of Interest from the public for one seat to the Presidio Municipal Development District (PMDD).**

### **Open Until August 15, 2025 at 5pm**

### **Must be a registered voter of the municipality and reside at said city for at least six-months, pursuant to Texas Local Government Code Section 22.032.**

### **Please submit your PMDD application, questionnaire (PMDD Application and Questionnaire on city website under Services-Public Notices) and Letter of Interest to the address below:**

### **City of Presidio**

### **City Secretary**

### **Physical Address: 507 W. O’Reilly St., Presidio, Texas**

### **Or email to: [bornelas@presidiotx.us](mailto:bornelas@presidiotx.us)**

### Presidio Municipal Development District Board members needed, please fill out [PMDD Application Board](https://presidiotx.us/wp-content/uploads/2025/05/PMDD-Application-Board.pdf) and their [Supplementary Board Application Questionnaire 2025](https://presidiotx.us/wp-content/uploads/2025/05/PMDD-Supplementary-Board-Application-Questionnaire-2025.pdf) and return to the City of Presidio City Secretary at City Hall, 507 W. O’Reilly St. Presidio, Texas or email your application and questionnaire to [bornelas@presidiotx.us](mailto:bornelas@presidiotx.us)

**The Presidio City Council, and Presidio Municipal Development District (PMDD), Reserves the Right to Adjourn Into Executive Session at Any Time During the Course of this Meeting to Discuss Any of the Matters Listed Above, as Authorized by the Texas Government Code including, but not limited to, Sections 551.071 (Consultation with Attorney), 551.072 (Deliberations About Real Property), 551.073 (Deliberations about Gifts and Donations), 551.074 (Personnel Matters), 551.076 (Deliberations about Security Devices), 551.087(Economic Development) and 418.183 (Deliberations about Homeland Security Issues).**
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Are you in an “A” Flood Zone?  That’s not good! “C” is where you want to be for the best prices for insurance.
[Presidio with Flood Zone Overlay](https://presidiotx.us/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/Presidio-with-Flood-Zone-Overlay.pdf)
Take a loop at the City Map to compare to the overlay to figure out where you live.
[MAP OF PRESIDIO 2010](https://presidiotx.us/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/MAP-OF-PRESIDIO-2010.pdf)
The City’s Flood Ordinance can be seen here too:
[Presidio Flood Ordinance](https://presidiotx.us/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/Presidio-Flood-Ordinance.pdf)


City Council Appointments Application is available in PDF Format on line.  Download here:
[city-board-application](https://presidiotx.us/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/City-Board-Application.pdf)
